title: How do I add or enroll my fingerprint?
answer: Perform the following steps:1. On the home screen, touch Settings.2. Under All, touch Fingerprint ID.3. Set a screen unlock PIN or password as the backup unlock mode.4. Follow the onscreen instructions to enroll your fingerprint. You need to enroll your fingerprint for several times to ensure that your fingerprint information is complete.You can enroll fingerprints of up to five fingers.
